entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Snow level 900 metres. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023
